name: RSH_INVITE_RECPNTS
description: This table contains the recipients of a research study invitation.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the enrollment record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: RECIPIENTS_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the MyChart user that is a recipient of the research study invitation.
